patthana8.20:1.1_0: Nosaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.20:1.1_1: Nosaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.20:1.1_2: Nosaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nosaññojano ca nanosaññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.20:2.1_0: Nanosaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.20:2.1_1: Nanosaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.20:2.1_2: Nanosaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nosaññojano ca nanosaññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.20:3.1_0: Nosaññojanañca nanosaññojanañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.20:3.1_1: Nosaññojanañca nanosaññojanañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.20:3.1_2: Nosaññojanañca nanosaññojanañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nosaññojano ca nanosaññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.20:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
